cause.description:
GLSEN, or the Gay, Lesbian & Straight Education Network, is the leading national education organization focused on ensuring safe schools for ALL students.
The Gay, Lesbian & Straight Education Network strives to assure that each member of every school community is valued and respected regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity/expression.
www.GLSEN.org www.DayofSilence.org
1. End Bullying and Harrasment in k-12 schools
2. Assure that each member of every school community is valued and respected regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity/expression.
3. Educate the common youth on LGBT issues
